fields.title: Renewable Energy Engineer
fields.description: Lead design and optimization of distributed solar arrays and micro-wind installations. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to improve system performance and reduce LCOE.

fields.title: Sustainability Program Manager
fields.description: Develop sustainability initiatives, manage reporting (GRI/SASB), and drive stakeholder engagement to meet net-zero goals by 2035.

fields.title: Environmental Data Scientist
fields.description: Build predictive models for air quality, emissions, and resource use. Work with geospatial data (GIS) and produce actionable insights for policy and operations.

fields.title: Carbon Accounting Analyst
fields.description: Implement carbon accounting methodologies, automate data pipelines, and support audit-ready reporting across the enterprise.

fields.title: Environmental Policy Researcher
fields.description: Research evolving environmental regulations, assess impact on industry sectors, and prepare briefings to inform strategic decisions.

fields.title: Lifecycle Assessment (LCA) Specialist
fields.description: Conduct cradle-to-grave LCAs for hardware products, identify hotspots, and recommend design improvements to minimize environmental impact.

fields.title: Sustainable Supply Chain Analyst
fields.description: Evaluate supplier sustainability metrics, implement improvements, and track progress against ESG targets across the supply chain.

fields.title: GIS Analyst (Environmental)
fields.description: Use GIS toolsets to visualize land use, habitats, and risk exposure. Support conservation planning and renewable siting decisions.
